scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:apps: npm run build -w apps/api -w apps/admin -w apps/blog -w apps/storefront
scripts.dev: npm run dev -w apps/admin & npm run dev -w apps/blog & npm run dev -w apps/api & npm run dev -w apps/storefront & npm run dev -w docs --parallel
scripts.lint: npm run lint:packages && npm run lint:apps
scripts.lint:apps: npm run lint -w apps/admin -w apps/blog -w apps/api -w apps/storefront
scripts.test: npm run test:packages && npm run test:apps
scripts.check-types: npm run check-types:packages && npm run check-types:apps
scripts.check-types:apps: npm run check-types -w apps/admin -w apps/blog -w apps/api -w apps/storefront
